description: As the weather heats up, our thoughts turn to cool and stimulating drinks that can help us cool down. And what could be more summery than a Tequila Sunset?This&nbsp;classic cocktail is the perfect balance of sweet and sour, with just a hint of smokiness from the tequila. The key to a great Tequila Sunset is to use fresh juice,&nbsp;quality tequila, and plenty of ice.And don't forget the cherry garnish! Whether you're enjoying a quiet evening at home or hosting a party for your friends, a Tequila Sunset is sure to please. So make ours a double and enjoy the taste of summer!
name: Cadillac Margarita
recipeIngredient: Lime wedges for rimming and serving

recipeInstructions.name: Rim two glasses with a lime wedge.
recipeInstructions.text: Rim two glasses with a lime wedge.

recipeInstructions.name: Place salt on a small plate and dip rim of glasses into salt.
recipeInstructions.text: Place salt on a small plate and dip rim of glasses into salt.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Add remaining ingredients and shake until well chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: Add remaining ingredients and shake until well chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill rimmed glasses with more ice, then strain the mixed cocktail into glasses.
